My Work

A single-page web app that allows users to draw pixel art on a customizable canvas! Users create a grid of squares representing their design, and apply colors to those squares to create a digital masterpiece! This project was made with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.

This is a simple game designed to test a user's memory by challenging them to find card matches.

Try It!

This web application allows you to store and track your favorite books in a virtual library. The library consists of three shelves: Currently, Reading, Want to Read and Read. This is a convenient way to track which books you have read or would like to read.

This recipe app was made with React and includes a search filter, comments, and rating system.

Try It!

Fully responsive restaurant review web application with offline capabilities. This app runs on a simple HTTP server that isn't compatible with Netlify or GitHub Pages. The best way to view the project is to download it from GitHub and install Python. It's easier than it sounds. Check out the readme file for detailed instructions.
